articles.author: Vicky Pathare
articles.title: Pune’s Serum Institute ships malaria vaccine to African countries - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Serum Institute of India ships R21/Matrix-M™ malaria vaccine to Africa, starting with Central African Republic. 163,800 doses allocated for CAR.
articles.content:
The Serum Institute of India (SII) on Monday shipped its first set of R21/Matrix-M malaria vaccine to Africa. 
CEO of Serum Institute of India, Adar Poonawalla and Ambassador of the United States of… [+1323 chars]
